    • Method Detail

      • postStopTimes

        public static java.lang.String postStopTimes(MarkedObject stop,
                                             org.json.JSONObject json,
                                             android.content.Context context)
        Posts the time string for the selected stop, which contains when the (selected) buses for that stop will be arriving and departing. This method also posts this string to the body of the popup window when the info window is clicked on.
        Parameters:
        stop - The stop (either an actual Stop object, or a SharedStop).
        json - The json object retrieved from the RouteMatch server.
        context - The context from which this method is being called from (for string lookup).
        Returns:
        The string containing either all the arrival and departure times for the stop, or the overflowString if there is too much data.

      • getEnabledRoutesForStop

        @NonNull
public static Route[] getEnabledRoutesForStop(@NonNull
                                                        Route[] allRoutesForStop)
        Returns an array of routes that are enabled from all the routes in the shared stop.
        Parameters:
        allRoutesForStop - The routes in the shared stop.
        Returns:
        The routes in the shared stop that are enabled.

      • getTime

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getTime(org.json.JSONObject json,
                                                  java.lang.String key)
        Gets the the time (predicted arrival or predicted departure depending on the key) for the stop via its JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        json - The JSONObject containing the time for the stop.
        key - The specific key to search for within the JSONObject.
        Returns:
        The time found within the JSONObject.

      • formatTime

        public static java.lang.String formatTime(java.lang.String time)
        Formats a given 24 hour time string into a 12 hour time string complete with AM/PM characters.
        Parameters:
        time - The time string (ie 13:15 for what should be 1:15 PM).
        Returns:
        The formatted time string with the AM/PM characters included.

      • getNewlineOccurrence

        public static int getNewlineOccurrence(java.lang.CharSequence string)
        Function that finds the number of times a character occurs within a given string.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to search.
        Returns:
        The number of times the character occurs within the string.

      • onCircleClick

        @UiThread
public void onCircleClick(@NonNull
                                     com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle circle)
        Called when a circle is clicked.

        This is called on the Android UI thread.

        Specified by:
        onCircleClick in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCircleClickListener
        Parameters:
        circle - The circle that is clicked.
